page.title: 07MORE ABOUT M.I.R.A.
page.content: {The Motor Industry Research {Association}is situated on the Watling Street (A5) near Nuneaton, Warwicks. About{230 staff are employed}including mechanical and electrical engineers, mathematicians,physicists and systems analysts. {Research programmes}are carried out and results are published although contract work is confidential to the client concerned.Membership is offered to manufacturing companies in the British Vehicle and Component Industries who are able to use the Proving Ground with their own staff. {The Proving Ground}has{45 Km of {special test tracks}for evaluation of every aspect of performance of cars,trucks,buses,motor cycles, as well as industrial,agricultural and military vehicles.Remaining land is farmed-everywhere excellent condition.
